about_the_game:
Nefarius: The Last Wizard is a captivating top-down 2D pixel art shooter that invites players into a magical world filled with danger and adventure. As Nefarius, the last remaining wizard, you are tasked with battling a vile army of slimes that have drained the magic from your homeland. With a diverse arsenal at your disposal, you’ll engage in thrilling combat, reclaiming your power and restoring balance to your realm.

A World Overrun by Slime


In Nefarius: The Last Wizard, the once-vibrant lands are now plagued by an insidious slime army. Each type of slime presents unique challenges, from the nimble tricksters to the towering bosses that guard powerful magic shards. Your mission is to defeat them all, reclaiming the magic that has been stolen from the world.

Epic Combat Awaits


Harness your skills as you wield an array of magical weapons and spells to defeat your foes. Experiment with different combinations to find the perfect strategy for each enemy encounter. Mastering the art of combat is essential as you progress through increasingly challenging levels.

Your Flying Sanctuary


Escape the slime threat by retreating to your flying island, a safe haven where your loyal friends reside. Here, you can purchase items, upgrades, and potions to enhance your abilities. Engage with your allies to take on side quests that deepen the story and reward you with unique treasures.

Unleash Your Potential with the Skill Tree


At the heart of your home island lies a mysterious fountain that unlocks a robust skill tree. Choose your path wisely as you invest in three powerful branches:

  • Vitality: Boost your healing abilities and durability in battle.
  • Combat: Increase your strength and agility for more effective attacks.
  • Focus: Improve resource management and control for strategic advantages.

Travel in the Slime Kingdom


As you defeat powerful slime bosses, collect magical shards that enhance your teleportation capabilities. Use the magical teleporter to explore vast new areas, each filled with more formidable foes and hidden secrets waiting to be uncovered. Travel to dangerous realms and face monstrous slimes that will put your skills to the ultimate test.

Join the Adventure!


Will you rise to the challenge and help Nefarius restore magic to his land? Embark on an epic journey filled with action, strategy, and adventure in Nefarius: The Last Wizard. The fate of your world lies in your hands—are you ready to save it?

  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 3.3

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Nefarius, a powerful wizard, battles against an evil slime army that has drained his land of magic. Defeating these slimes allows him to reclaim his power through the magic shards they drop. Help Nefarius restore balance and save his realm from darkness.
